infos.title: Inquisitor of Blood and Iron
infos.like: Her family, the knights, pride, creed and valor, chess, and smart people
infos.dislike: Those disgraceful to the Empire, and the enemies that threaten the peace of the Empire
infos.story: Commander of Velchia, the proud Magic Knights of the Empire, and the inquisitor working directly under the Emperor. It is her duty to eliminate corruption, rebels, and everything else that threatens the Empire. The people of the Empire praise her and think of her as a hero, a title she has never been eager to accept. As the daughter of the Van Nosenhill family, and as a soldier of the Empire, all that matters to her is fulfilling her duties.

uw.name: Prism Nova, Arc Lumineir
uw.description:
Upon gaining [Lights], receives various effects.
[Red Light] - Increases ATK of all allies by (0) for 10 sec.
[Blue Light] - Increases DEF of all allies by (1) for 10 sec.
[Green Light] - Recovers Mana of all allies by (2).
uw.story: One of the newly invented weapons of Magos Le'Flamme, the researching organization of the Empire. Akistra was developed to be a cannon with maximized killing power, whereas Arc Lumineir was made as a multi-purpose strategic weapon. Researchers, while studying to control the power of light, combined the attribute of a light-dispersing ore and the principle of Technomagic that has its roots in Elemental Magic, and came up with a brand new concept for an optical weapon.

1.name: Sword of Nosenhill
1.description: [Light of Annihilation] Increases DMG by (0) and resets Cooldown upon killing an enemy.
1.story: A fine sword and the family treasure of the Van Nosenhill family. The Van Nosenhill family has been deemed noble for its production of many outstanding strategists and commanders since the first emperor's reign. Ever since the sword was bestowed upon the family by the first emperor, the leaders of Van Nosenhill have always carried it with them.

2.name: Certificate of Inquisitor
2.description: [Enemy Blockade] Reduces Cooldown by 5 sec, and for 10 sec, increases M.DMG target receives by (0).
2.story: The inquisitor's plaque that the Emperor bestowed upon Chrisha. The silver wolf and the sword in its mouth symbolize authority and control, with which Chrisha could enact justice and chastise evil on behalf of the Emperor.

3.name: Pride of Velchia
3.description: [Green Zone]Reduces Cooldown by 30% and increases Heal Rate Reduction Effect of Green Zone by an additional (0).
3.story: A ring bestowed upon the Commander of the Velchia Magic Knights. It represents the power and pride of the finest order of magic knights in the Empire. Knights also use the ring as a stamp while doing paper work.

4.name: Prism of Primary Colors
4.description: [Technomagic of the Empire] Upon gaining the Light, increases own ATK by 3% and DMG to Non-Hero enemies by (0) for 20 sec. This effect can be stacked up to max 10 times.
4.story: The core of Arc Lumineir and a Mana source that disperses lights of certain wavelength. This mineral was a very powerful artifact to use elemental spells with, but it was not hard enough to withstand stronger magic. The technomagic of Magos Le'Flamme greatly enhanced its hardness, and now it is used as an optical weapon.

sw.story:
Chrisha incessantly researched her weapon, Arc Lumineir. Her philosophy was that one cannot hope to defeat any enemy if one does not fully understand his/her weapon. Chrisha examined the blueprint she got from Magos Le'flamme, and wrote her own diary in-between. Then one day, she found another power that was sleeping inside Arc Lumineir. It was another light that even the researchers who developed Arc Lumineir did not mention. Chrisha was taken by surprise, but she quickly regained her calmness and realiued that she is the only one who can draw this new-found power.
'At last, i know for sure now that this is the weapon which only i can use. From now on, I will take you to all battles I fight, and use every single abilities you hold:'
After then, Arc Lumineir was reborn as a weapon that releases massive light containing three elemental magic.
